JOB DESCRIPTION: Education Background: BE, BTech, MCA, MS, MSc, MTech degree required.Job Description:- Understanding why a feature is required and what you must do build it.- Logical reasoning to question the product manager and change the feature idea.- Analytical thinking and research to figure out how you must do it.- Juggling your major work and your minor projects in a way so that you meet deadlines.- Programming product features using Java, JSP, Servlets, JavaScript, Spring, Struts, Hibernate, MySql, Eclipse, Jboss.- Testing your code and getting a code review done before each commit.- Maintaining all your live features as their ownerDesired Skills & Experience- 5+ years experience in the field of software development- Experience working with banking or finance domain preferred.- Must be interested in web start ups and an avid user of commerce websites globally- Common sense approach to problem solving is expected- One or many of these required: prior start up experience, contribution to open source projects, volunteering gigs, self started projects, freelance projects, etc.- Must be able to take risks- Skills important but self-starter attitude very important- Must be able to stick for one year minimum- Exposure to a transnational web application or the financial services space will be handy

EDUCATION.PG: MS/M.Sc(Science) in Any Specialization, M.Tech in Any Specialization, MCA in Any Specialization
